component.name: Moolticute
component.summary: Companion GUI application for Mooltipass password manager devices

description.p: Moolticute is an easy to use companion app to your Mooltipass device and extends the power of the device to more platform/tools. It allows you to manage your Mooltipass with a cross-platform app and daemon service that handles all USB communication with the device.

Moolticute comes with a daemon that runs in the background, and a user interface app to control your Mooltipass. Other clients can also connect and talk to the daemon (it uses a WebSocket connection and simple JSON messages).
